pages.text: Gustav is inspired by Schwerer Gustav, a massive German railway cannon used in WW2 that could fire 800mm shells. This ship features a large cannon capable of obliterating anything hit. Gustav is always accompanied by Günther, a small, heavily armed ship to protect it, as it has no other weapons besides the large cannon.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/frag_bomb)$(l)Mega Shell/$$(br)Gustav fires its cannon, launching a massive shell at $(l)the selected tile/$. If the tile contains a ship, the shell explodes, $(l)damaging all 8 adjacent tiles/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)16 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/counterfire)$(l)Cover Fire/$$(br)$(l)When hit/$, Günther $(l)fires 3 shells at random opponent tiles/$ in an attempt to protect Gustav.
pages.title: Passive Ability
